liver.steatosis: Hepatic steatosis without fat fraction of 13.5%
liver.focus_of_enhancement: 6 mm focus of arterial enhancement at the inferior right lobe of the liver
liver.additional_notes: No correlate on additional sequences, likely perfusional

biliary.intrahepatic_bile_ducts: Mild dilatation of the proximal intrahepatic bile ducts

findings.pancreas: Normal in signal and enhancement, no ductal dilatation or concerning pancreatic lesions
findings.spleen: Normal, no focal splenic lesions or splenomegaly
findings.kidneys: No concerning renal lesions or hydronephrosis
findings.osseous_and_soft_tissue: No concerning osseous lesions or notable soft tissue abnormality
